data.short_description: Word wrapping failure with text after a code block
data.steps_to_repro: - Have monitor on 1440x900 resolution - Have discord fullscreen on that - Enable compact mode on Discord - Type in a codeblock, and then an amount of text after it, and it will fail to wordwrap towards the end sometimes - My test phrase: This phrase might just run off of the page because it's a bit longer than stuff that gets discord antidisestablishmentarianism display - Put that after an empty or even full code block, but on the same line as the \`\`\`
